name: Ender Backpack

pages.text: Wearable Ender Chest, but with pickup options, and support quick access.

pages: Features:$(li)This can be put on chest slot (or back slot of Curios), and can be opened via key bind.$(li)$(l:mechanics/any_access)Quick Access$(/l)$(li)$(l:mechanics/quick_insert)Quick Insert$(/l)$(li)$(l:mechanics/exit)Menu Stacking$(/l)$(li)$(l:mechanics/pickup)Recursive Pickup$(/l)
